data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article George, Kai Horst (2008): Argestes angolaensis sp. nov. (Copepoda: Harpacticoida: Argestidae) from the Angola Basin (Southeast Atlantic), and the phylogenetic characterization of the taxon Argestes Sars, including the redescription of A. mollis Sars, 1910, and A. reductus (Itô, 1983) *. Zootaxa 1866: 223-262, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183720
